summary: A katana that has fancy effects, staggers on every hit, has higher damage than the dragonbone sword, and believe it or not, it has a sheath! OMG!
descriptionHtml:
A katana that has fancy effects, staggers on every hit, has higher damage than the dragonbone sword, and believe it or not, it has a sheath! OMG!

([b]This is my first sword[/b], if you want something fancier, then consider taking a look at my second creation nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51263 )

The sword can be found in a cellar behind the Guard Barracks in Whiterun, there's also a screenshot that shows the exact location, as well as a video.
Alternatively you can obtain it by using this console command: player.additem 2E000D63 1

No DLCs required, and there should be no compatibility issues.

To install:
> Unzip the archive inside Skyrim's Data folder
-> Start "SkyrimLauncher"
--> Click on "Data Files" within the menu (this is important, because it loads the mod)
---| And now you are done.

Different mods that can be seen in the screenshots:
The clock -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44091/?
The trees -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9558/?
author: HakitoJin
